title: When will the government give our NTSE scholarship money? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am eagerly waiting too! It's going to be a year now. But, I contacted few of my seniors and they told that they received it sometime in feb…and this year the paper was delayed so it may take more time. Best is to not think so much of it…it shall arrive! Just keep an eye on the ncert website….where they will announce the start of the procedure of distributing the award letters and user ids for login on the web portal for disbursement of scholarship. Hope it helped!

You have recieve a communication from the NCERT and they will ask you to fill a form and submit it ckewrly mentioning your account number Adhaar number and other details. They usually release the money on quarterly or half yearly basis. Contact NCERT for any queries regarding delay.
